Class FormatInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_cudacodec.FormatInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @Namespace(value="cv::cudacodec")
 @NoOffset
 @Properties(inherit=opencv_cudacodec.class)
public class FormatInfo
extends Pointer
    \brief Struct providing information about video file format. :
